query: MERGE INTO RegularExpensesMothlyDetails AS target USING (SELECT $LosUnique_Id$ AS LosUnique_Id,$HHEX#AccommodationRent$ AS AccommodationRent,$HHEX#AccommodationRentRemark$ AS AccommodationRentRemark,$HHEX#Cothes$ AS Cothes,$HHEX#CothesRemark$ AS CothesRemark,$HHEX#ElectricityphoneDataCable$ AS ElectricityphoneDataCable,$HHEX#ElectricityphoneDataCableRemark$ AS ElectricityphoneDataCableRemark,$HHEX#Transport$ AS Transport,$HHEX#TransportRemark$ AS TransportRemark,$HHEX#Saving$ AS Saving,$HHEX#SavingRemark$ AS SavingRemark,$HHEX#TotalRegularExpenseMothly$ AS TotalRegularExpenseMothly,$HHEX#FoodCookingfuel$ AS FoodCookingfuel,$HHEX#FoodCookingfuelRemark$ AS FoodCookingfuelRemark,$HHEX#RegularEducationExpenses$ AS RegularEducationExpenses,$HHEX#RegularEducationExpensesRemark$ AS RegularEducationExpensesRemark,$HHEX#RegularMedicalCosts$ AS RegularMedicalCosts,$HHEX#RegularMedicalCostsRemark$ AS RegularMedicalCostsRemark,$HHEX#EntertainmentSocialobligations$ AS EntertainmentSocialobligations,$HHEX#EntertainmentSocialobligationsRemark$ AS EntertainmentSocialobligationsRemark,$HHEX#Other$ AS Other,$HHEX#OtherRemark$ as OtherRemark)AS source ON target.LosUnique_Id = source.LosUnique_Id WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET target.AccommodationRent = source.AccommodationRent,target.AccommodationRentRemark = source.AccommodationRentRemark,target.Cothes = source.Cothes,target.CothesRemark = source.CothesRemark,target.ElectricityphoneDataCable = source.ElectricityphoneDataCable,target.ElectricityphoneDataCableRemark = source.ElectricityphoneDataCableRemark,target.Transport = source.Transport,target.TransportRemark = source.TransportRemark,target.Saving = source.Saving,target.SavingRemark = source.SavingRemark,target.TotalRegularExpenseMothly = source.TotalRegularExpenseMothly,target.FoodCookingfuel = source.FoodCookingfuel,target.FoodCookingfuelRemark=source.FoodCookingfuelRemark,target.RegularEducationExpenses = source.RegularEducationExpenses,target.RegularEducationExpensesRemark = source.RegularEducationExpensesRemark,target.RegularMedicalCosts = source.RegularMedicalCosts,target.RegularMedicalCostsRemark = source.RegularMedicalCostsRemark,target.EntertainmentSocialobligations = source.EntertainmentSocialobligations,target.EntertainmentSocialobligationsRemark = source.EntertainmentSocialobligationsRemark,target.Other = source.Other,target.OtherRemark = source.OtherRemark WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (LosUnique_Id, AccommodationRent,AccommodationRentRemark,Cothes,CothesRemark,ElectricityphoneDataCable,ElectricityphoneDataCableRemark,Transport,TransportRemark,Saving,SavingRemark,TotalRegularExpenseMothly,FoodCookingfuel,FoodCookingfuelRemark,RegularEducationExpenses,RegularEducationExpensesRemark,RegularMedicalCosts,RegularMedicalCostsRemark,EntertainmentSocialobligations,EntertainmentSocialobligationsRemark,Other,OtherRemark) VALUES (source.LosUnique_Id,source.AccommodationRent, source.AccommodationRentRemark,source.Cothes,source.CothesRemark,source.ElectricityphoneDataCable,source.ElectricityphoneDataCableRemark,source.Transport,source.TransportRemark,source.Saving,source.SavingRemark,source.TotalRegularExpenseMothly,source.FoodCookingfuel,source.FoodCookingfuelRemark,source.RegularEducationExpenses,source.RegularEducationExpensesRemark, source.RegularMedicalCosts,source.RegularMedicalCostsRemark,source.EntertainmentSocialobligations,source.EntertainmentSocialobligationsRemark,source.Other,source.OtherRemark );

_query: MERGE INTO HouseHold_Submit_FCO_API AS target USING (SELECT $LosUnique_Id$ AS LosUnique_Id,$HHI#Totalhouseholdfamilymembers$ AS Totalhouseholdfamilymembers, $HHI#FamilyType$ AS FamilyType,$HHI#NoofDependents$ AS NoofDependents,$HHI#TypeofOwnership$ AS TypeofOwnership,$HHI#ReligionCommunity$ AS ReligionCommunity,$HHI#NonEarningMembers$ AS NonEarningMembers,$HHI#NoofUnmarriedChildren$ AS NoofUnmarriedChildren,$HHI#TypeofRoof$ AS TypeofRoof,$HHI#Locality$ AS Locality,$HHI#CasteCategory$ AS CasteCategory,$HHI#Electricity$ AS Electricity,$HHI#Toilet$ AS Toilet,$HHI#Sewage$ AS Sewage,$HHI#LPG$ AS LPG,$HHI#Livestock$ AS Livestock,$HHI#Furniture$ AS Furniture,$HHI#Electronicitems$ AS Electronicitems,$HHI#Water$ AS Water,$HHI#Land$ AS Land,$HHI#Vehicle$ AS Vehicle,$HHI#Smartphone$ AS Smartphone)AS source ON target.LosUnique_Id = source.LosUnique_Id WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET target.Totalhouseholdfamilymembers = source.Totalhouseholdfamilymembers, target.FamilyType = source.FamilyType,target.NoofDependents = source.NoofDependents,target.TypeofOwnership = source.TypeofOwnership,target.ReligionCommunity = source.ReligionCommunity,target.NonEarningMembers = source.NonEarningMembers,target.NoofUnmarriedChildren = source.NoofUnmarriedChildren,target.TypeofRoof = source.TypeofRoof,target.Locality = source.Locality,target.CasteCategory = source.CasteCategory,target.Electricity = source.Electricity,target.Toilet = source.Toilet,target.Sewage = source.Sewage,target.LPG = source.LPG,target.Livestock = source.Livestock,target.Furniture = source.Furniture,target.Electronicitems = source.Electronicitems,target.Water = source.Water,target.Land = source.Land,target.Vehicle = source.Vehicle,target.Smartphone = source.Smartphone WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (LosUnique_Id, Totalhouseholdfamilymembers,FamilyType,NoofDependents,TypeofOwnership,ReligionCommunity,NonEarningMembers,NoofUnmarriedChildren,TypeofRoof,Locality,CasteCategory,Electricity,Toilet,Sewage,LPG,Livestock,Furniture,Electronicitems,Water,Land,Vehicle,Smartphone) VALUES (source.LosUnique_Id, source.Totalhouseholdfamilymembers, source.FamilyType,source.NoofDependents,source.TypeofOwnership,source.ReligionCommunity,source.NonEarningMembers,source.NoofUnmarriedChildren,source.TypeofRoof,source.Locality,source.CasteCategory,source.Electricity,source.Toilet,source.Sewage,source.LPG, source.Livestock,source.Furniture,source.Electronicitems,source.Water,source.Land,source.Vehicle,source.Smartphone );
